review: I love this stick!! It's so compact. Like I need another big piece of electronics on my tv stand (Sarcasm).  It is really easy to use and I love that I can browse on my Kindle and add things to my watch list from there.The only negative thing is that I found the remote back hard to slide to put the batteries in. Hopefully the ones in there last long so I don't have to change them anytime soon.

review: What a fun little dongle. Wanted something to be able to access Amazon and Netflix video on my kitchen counter TV, which is fortunately new enough to have an HDMI port. I ordered one of these but it was back ordered and I happened to stumble onto one at Best Buy so bought it there instead. This was a breeze to set up. It works flawlessly. There are some fun apps available. Intuitive and easy to use.
